extension.config.title: Replace Accents
extension.config.removeDiacritics.title: Replace Accents
extension.config.userCharacterMapping.de: Define custom character mappings for accent removal. Use this to specify how special characters should be converted (e.g., German 'ß' to 'ss', ligatures 'æ' to 'ae'). Applied after normalization.
extension.config.textLanguage.desc: Choose your text’s language to improve removing and restoring diacritics.
extension.config.diacriticRestoreSuffixM: Attempt to restore accents inside inflected words by matching dictionary stems and keeping their suffixes (e.g., 'edenyemet' → 'edény' + 'emet' → 'edényemet'). Improves coverage for inflections but can cause incorrect matches. Leave disabled unless needed.
extension.config.diacriticIgnoredWords.d: List of words to exclude from accent restoration. These words will remain unchanged even if they exist in the dictionary.
extension.category.utilities.title: Utilities
extension.category.help.title: Help
extension.command.reportIssue.title: Repost Issue
extension.command.removeDiacritics.title: Remove Diacritics (áéő - aeo)
